DOC.criteria: All male patient age 18 Visiting evaluation Haematuria Lower urinary tract symptom ( include poor steam urine , intermittency , hesitancy , incomplete void urine , increase urgency , increase frequency , nocturia urge incontinence ) For removal double J ureteral stent include study .
